This version has been optimized for iOS 12 and includes these and other new features and improvements:

• Adds the ability to create Archives using forScore's Backup tool, allowing you to export your entire music library as a single 4SB file
• Su

This version has been optimized for iOS 12 and includes these and other new features and improvements:

• Adds the ability to create Archives using forScore's Backup tool, allowing you to export your entire music library as a single 4SB file
• Su

This update includes the following changes and other minor bug fixes and enhancements:

• Fixes a crash when attempting to crop pages on devices running iOS 9
• Updates the sound bank used to play back MIDI files, providing a wider range of instr

• Fixes a crash when attempting to crop pages on devices running iOS 9
• Updates the sound bank used to play back MIDI files, providing a wider range of instr

This version provides a workaround for an iOS 12 bug that affects annotation responsiveness, fixes several minor bugs, and adds a link to our privacy policy in the Support panel to comply with Apple's updated requirements.

This version provides a workaround for an iOS 12 bug that affects annotation responsiveness, fixes several minor bugs, and adds a link to our privacy policy in the Support panel to comply with Apple's updated requirements.

This version has been optimized for the latest iPads, supports the new Apple Pencil's double tap gesture, and includes many other features and improvements. Here are just a few quick highlights:

• Double tap the new Apple Pencil to switch or adjust

This version improves support for the newest iPad Pros and includes minor bug fixes. Here's what's new in 10.5:

• Double tap the new Apple Pencil to switch or adjust tools while annotating, or to perform a customizable action when not annotating

• Double tap the new Apple Pencil to switch or adjust tools while annotating, or to perform a customizable action when not annotating

This version includes bug fixes and minor improvements.

This update fixes a potential crash when editing metadata, resolves a bug in the Setlist menu that prevented sorting changes from immediately taking effect, and ensures that the visibility of text annotations is properly updated on all pages after showing

This version corrects an issue that could cause a freeze when opening the stamps palette, resolves an issue when resetting all Dashboard data for a specific day, provides a workaround for a system issue that results in duplicate pages when merging scores,

This version corrects an issue that could cause a freeze when opening the stamps palette, resolves an issue when resetting all Dashboard data for a specific day, provides a workaround for a system issue that results in duplicate pages when merging scores,

This huge update includes a brand new cropping interface with enhanced functionality, continuous pitch pipe sounds, Spotlight integration, new annotation gestures, mouse and trackpad support, and more. This version also features big Content Provider upgra

This huge update includes a brand new cropping interface with enhanced functionality, continuous pitch pipe sounds, Spotlight integration, new annotation gestures, mouse and trackpad support, and more. This version also features big Content Provider upgra
This update includes minor bug fixes/improvements and resolves a crash for some users when changing a text annotation's layer.

This version includes minor bug fixes and provides an optional workaround to prevent system-related crashes on iOS and iPadOS 13.4 or later (please visit forScore.co/crashes to learn more).

This update provides a workaround for a bug introduced in iOS and iPadOS 13.6.1 that could cause the pitch pipe and piano keyboard to stop making sounds after using the Tuner or recording function.

This major update introduces a completely new page layout engine with three display modes that give you the best possible view of your music. Double tap the center of the page to see the new Display Options overlay and switch between these modes.

T

You can now turn pages with head movements using the motion sensing capabilities of AirPods Pro (see forScore.co/airpods-pro for complete details and requirements). This version also includes bug fixes and enhancements, including major improvements to Dua

This version resolves an issue that prevented the system's privacy prompt from appearing as expected when setting up AirPods Pro gestures.
